byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Capt F von Rintelen discloses details of German sabotage in U S
snippet: LONDON, Jan. 3--New details concerning the Black Tom explosion and other acts of sabotage which he helped to commit in the United States before its entry into the World War were provided today by Captain Franz von Rintelen, former secret agent who...

headline.main: PLOTTED BLACK TOM, SAYS VON RINTELEN; As German Agent, Instigated Sabotage on 32 Ships in the World War HAD 3,000 AIDES HERE Ex-Officer Ridicules Efforts of the Reich to Avoid Paying Explosion Claim Foreign Office Dispute Recalled Payment of Fee Is Recalled Ship Crews Aided Sabotage

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan. 3--New details concerning the Black Tom explosion and other acts of sabotage which he helped to commit in the United States before its entry into the World War were provided today by Captain Franz von Rintelen, former secret agent who has foresworn ...
